thread.title: Pittsburgh Steelers vs. San Diego Chargers: Monday Night Football live updates, score, game chat
thread.title_full: Pittsburgh Steelers vs. San Diego Chargers: Monday Night Football live updates, score, game chat | OregonLive.com

author: Tim Brown | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Pittsburgh Steelers vs. San Diego Chargers: Monday Night Football live updates, score, game chat
text:
The Pittsburgh Steelers and backup quarterback Michael Vick kick off the final game of Week 5 of the 2015 NFL season with a trip to the west coast where they'll face the the San Diego Chargers . Kickoff is at 5:30 p.m. PT. TV on ESPN.
More : What TV channel and how to watch this game online
Follow along as we bring you live updates and analysis from the game from kickoff through the final whistle in the comments section below. Have thoughts on how the Steelers or Chargers are performing? Don't hesitate to jump in on the live updates and chat with us as the game rolls along.
